# dubois: From DuBois Challenge 2022, I developed an area plot in ggplot2. It shows the percentage of blacks and whites in managerial positions 

<img align="center" src="https://github.com/IcaroBernardes/dubois/blob/master/img/icaro_dubois_tt.jpeg?raw=true" alt="logo" height="200">
<p align="justify">dubois is a computational package to create area plot with ggplot2. It shows the percentage of blacks and whites in managerial positions. The development inspiration came from the #DuBoisChallenge2022 and the dissemination of SER (International Seminar on Statistics with R) </p>
